Documentation Tooling Source

Cabin

The simple, safe, and speedy language for the developer who wants to Get Stuff Done™

$ cargo install cabin-language

Simple

Cabin is designed to be as simple as possible. No special exceptions, no crazy syntax, no hidden control flow. Most importantly, the code does what you'd expect it to do.

Cabin's philosophy is that stupidly obvious solutions are better than clever tricky ones.

Cabin code often reads exactly how you would say it in English. 

// FizzBuzz in Cabin

foreach number in 1.to(100) {
	if number.mod(3) = 0 and number.mod(5) = 0 {
		terminal.print("FizzBuzz");
	}

	otherwise if number.mod(3) = 0 {
		terminal.print("Fizz");
	}

	otherwise if number.mod(5) = 0 {
		terminal.print("Buzz");
	}

	otherwise {
		terminal.print(number);
	};
}
